pkgmetadata.longdescription: Symbolic Computation for Structural Equation Models // A collection of functions for symbolic computation using 'Ryacas' package for structural equation models. This package includes functions to calculate model-implied covariance (and correlation) matrix and sampling covariance matrix of functions of variables using the first-order Taylor approximation. Reference: McArdle and McDonald (1984) doi:10.1111/j.2044-8317.1984.tb00802.x.
